ygData.subject: Re: Why did you choose to play a paladin?
ygData.msgSnippet: You play a human in rl?  No way...? =) Tiresias Servant of Erollisi Marr ... From: Brian Williams  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
You play a human in rl? No way...?

=)

Tiresias
Servant of Erollisi Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Brian Williams <gungho77@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 09, 1999 2:55 PM
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Why did you choose to play a paladin?


> From: "Brian Williams" <gungho77@...>
>
> Well, my question has incited some postings and that is what i had hoped
> for. This list is kinda on the quiet side and i was hoping to help incite
> some life into it. If something interesting happened to you on day while
> playing or you ran across something cool or you just have a
question...share
> it with all here. I myself like hearing about someone's interesting
> experience as I might learn something from it.
>
> Well, i forgot to tell why I chose a paladin. To me, a paladin is like a
> knight in shining armor.... swooping in to save the day and all that. They
> are like a super-hero. Me, i like sharing and helping others and most
expect
> a paladin to do just that . I want to be that knight coming to save the
> day.. fight against insurmountable odds so your friends can live to fight
> another day. I chose Half-Elf because high elves and Erudites are too
> conceited, Dwarves are too short(no offense intended) and I play a human
in
> RL.
>
> Abrell of Cazic-Thule
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Wanting to get back in touch with old friends?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Reunite through a ONElist community.
>
